Coral_Springs.Coral Glades High School:
Coral Glades High School is a public high school in Coral Springs, Florida. Founded in 2004, it is part of the Broward School District.
The school's principal is Steven Carruth, the mascot is the Jaguar, and the school colors are teal, black, and white. Students at Coral Glades are in grades 9 through 12.
Coral Glades has a Florida Comprehensive Assessment Test school grade of "A" for the 2010-2011 academic year.
